creator: PUZZLE STUDIO PTE. LTD.
descriptionHtml:
Knife Master: Blades Away is a fascinating and addictive arcade game that will give you a little de-stressing and entertaining moment. Just a simple tap away to make the knife hit the log, but be careful - try not to hit the existing knives or the spikes to keep going with the endless journey. Throw all the knifes, destroy the target, and collect strawberries to complete a collection of multiple edgy blades - choose your weapon to fight the ultimate boss and find out who is the real knife hit master!

It is easy to control with one finger and the rules are simple, but things can get tricky quickly as you face the unpredictable motion of the target. Be patient, you not only have to train a steady mind and high concentration, but also fast reflexes to wait for the right timing and make instant decision of sending your blades away. Be thrilled by many "close call" moments that make your heart pump and enjoy a rush of adrenaline!

Try Knife Master: Blades Away and become a master in the throwing knife games today!

KNIFE MASTER - BLADES AWAY FEATURES:
- Simple and smooth control with one finger.
- User-friendly interface, suitable for all ages.
- Minimalistic and adorable graphics to keep you enjoy throwing knife games for hours.
- Stunning combination of sound effect, phone vibration and bursting images.
- Unlock all of the stylish edgy blades to customize your game.
- Hundreds of on going levels and multiple bosses to discover and conquer.

HOW TO PLAY KNIFE MASTER - BLADES AWAY:
- Tap to make a hit, throw all your blades to destroy the target and move on to the next level.
- Be careful not to hit any spikes or existing knives or you will immediately lose!
- You will face the ultimate bosses after each ten levels - it can be very tricky, but stay focused and reflexes quickly, then you'll be fine!
- Collect strawberries that appear in every level to unlock a full collection of weapons.
- Keep winning and going on a non-stop journey of throwing knife games.

REASONS TO PLAY KNIFE MASTER - BLADES AWAY:
- Combination of stunning sound effect, phone vibration and minimalistic adorable graphics will give you the satisfying experience of achievement and relieve your stress.
- This game will help you enhance your concentration and fast reflexes, as well as predicting skills to make the right timing and become a hit master.
- Facing tough situations will help you build a steady mind, strategic planning skills, as well as making instant decisions, which help to boost your blood circulation and stimulate your brain in a very fun way.

Let's try Knife Master: Blades Away to test your skills and see who is the real hit master!

Term of Service: https://puzzle.sg/terms-and-conditions/
Privacy Policy: https://puzzle.sg/privacy-policy/
descriptionShort: Make knife hit, fight with ultimate bosses, and conquer hundreds of challenges.
